name: ld40 - lumberjack
description:
You're a lumberjack, and you have to cut enough wood to keep everyone warm through the winter.

If there is enough wood, it might attract more NPCs.

The woodpile is the little square bar thing by the house in the village, you must cut down trees and gather logs and stack them on the woodpile for the NPCs to use.

Currently only available on windows/HMTL, but will try to port to other platforms soon (Mac, Linux, maybe mobile?).

Keys:

Arrow keys move left and right, Move far enough left or right to goto the forest.

Space bar interacts with objects (trees and the woodpile).

Tools Used:

GameMaker Studio 1.4

PyxelEdit

Ableton Live Intro

BFXR
